name: picnic-ants
description: Ants Feast for Phaser 3 in TypeScript

scripts.dev-ssl: npm run webpack-dev && webpack-dev-server index-dev.html --mode development --https --host=0.0.0.0 --disable-host-check --useLocalIp
scripts.enable-debug-mobile: sudo adb forward tcp:9222 localabstract:chrome_devtools_remote; google-chrome localhost:9222
scripts.debug-mobile: npm run enable-debug-mobile && npm run dev-ssl
scripts.commit-production-bundle: git add dist/bundle.js && (git commit -m "publishing production bundle" || true)
scripts.publish: webpack --mode production && npm run commit-production-bundle && git push
